Contents of SPECIMEN

The SPECIMEN package contains a number of modules and subpackages, which are listed below.

To seach by name, use the Index, for a list of the modules, see Module Index.

specimen subpackages

  • specimen.classes
    • specimen.classes.reports submodule
  • specimen.cmpb
    • specimen.cmpb submodules
      • specimen.cmpb.workflow
  • specimen.hqtb
    • specimen.hqtb subpackages
      • specimen.hqtb.core package
    • specimen.hqtb submodules
      • specimen.hqtb.workflow
  • specimen.util
    • specimen.util submodules
    • specimen.util.set_up module
    • specimen.util.util module
      • create_DIAMOND_db_from_folder()
      • create_NCBIinfo_mapping()
      • get_info_GenBank_Record()

specimen submodules

The direct submodules of SPECIMEN are mainly for accessing the tool. They consists of one module for the command line access.

  • specimen.cmd_access
    • General Options
    • specimen setup
    • specimen run
